meanings.definition: Areas with green plants or vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The park is full of beautiful greeneries.
meanings.sent2: I love to take walks in the greeneries near my house.
meanings.sent3: The greeneries in the garden seem to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up like blooming greeneries in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The greeneries danced in the gentle breeze, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of being green or covered in green plants.
meanings.sent1: The lush greeneries of the forest create a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The greeneries of spring bring new life to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The greeneries of the meadow whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a garden of greeneries, full of fresh ideas.
meanings.sent5: The greeneries of the valley painted a vibrant picture against the blue sky.
